website_summaries.verdict: A large, contemporary medicine cabinet perfect for bathrooms with little storage space.
pros: Hang 'N' Lock system for easy install
cons: A few customers have complained of trouble with the hinges

customer_reviews.title: Nice even as a surface mount
customer_reviews.text: Great price, easy install. Comes with nice mirror trim for using as a surface mount, so nice I decided to use it this way versus cutting out more of the wall. Shelves should have more adjustable places, kinda unusable for some tall items.
customer_reviews.author: B in Alabama

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed at the quality detail and finish on this product
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the quality detail and finish on this product! Inside of the cabinet is fisnished with a mirror finish unlike many that are a painted finish. Every detail was clearly explained in the instructions and the mounting hardware included wall anchors as well as a built in bubble level to insure a level installation. Don't let the price fool you this product is first rate! I paid full price for this and am not being sponsored with any incentives to write this review, just a very satisfied customer.....
customer_reviews.author: Marvin L. Benoit

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: Really badly made. Side mirrors both came out cause glue wasn’t strong enough, thank god I caught it before they fell and broke all over the bathroom and god forbid hurt someone! I’m returning it and have to say that you get what you pay for... much cheaper than the leading brand, but safety is really everything! It came cracked but I was ok with a replacement one... now I’m genuinly scared!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Product came damaged twice - broken glass / mirrors in ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged twice - broken glass / mirrors in two different areas. Returned one and installed the other one after our contractor removed the back which is a mirror inside, and replaced it with a piece of thin plywood that we bought from the local hardware store and spray painted. We had already cut out a recessed area for this specific medicine cabinet but didn't want to chance yet another one arriving damaged, so settled with this work around. Lesson learned is I doubt we will online order an item with so much glass - too risky!
customer_reviews.author: Neal N.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, elegant Medicine Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, small medicine cabinet. Fits perfect in our small, second bathroom. The fact that the door is a double sided mirror works perfect. The cabinet door swings open to a wall so the fact that the inside of the door is also a mirror makes it very useful. Inside of cabinet it also reflective, looks very clean. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FER

customer_reviews.title: 36 Tri view mirrored medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: The way these medicine cabinets are packaged. It woul take on heck of a blow to damage or crack the mirrors. The medicine cabinet has a nice fit and finish. The 36" tri view is basically 3 12 inch medicine cabinets next to each other. The shelves are glass, 11 inches wide and are adjustable in height. Cabinet has soft close doors. The instructions to assemble and mount the cabinet are very confusing and frustrating. Even after viewing you tube videos. I was still scratching my head. This is the same medicine cabinet as Jac**zi brand (Whirlpool tubs). They have downloadable instructions, videos and dimensions that may help. Looks great once correctly assembled and hung.
customer_reviews.author: P. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Finely made medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is a finely made medicine cabinet using quality materials and European style self-closing hinges. The design of the hinges permits the cabinet to be installed next to a wall whether you it is surface mounted or recessed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Fe

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, Mirrored inside as well as out, Reversible
customer_reviews.text: Mirrored inside and out, adjustable glass shelves, and made of durable aluminum. The Hang-N-Lock system is great, and made installation a breeze because you install the bracket first. Get it all level and postioned without having to support the weight of the cabinet. Then you hook the cabinet onto the bracket and bolt the thing in place. Cake! The interior is not one giant space, but rather two compartments one behind each door. It came well packaged and protected, and was delivered unharmed.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how lacking the quality of this product is. While it may be beautiful, that is off no concern when side sticky pieces that are supposed to hold glass in place don't stick, fall off, and i have shattered glass all over my bathroom. It created a dangerous mess and could have result in a terrible product liability issue for the company. I highly recommend they fix this issue...IMMEDIATELY
customer_reviews.author: howard kornblum

customer_reviews.title: Door hinges could detach at any moment
customer_reviews.text: Hinges are cheap as others have mentioned. After 3 months of normal use, the door hinge detached from the mount, almost taking my wife's face off. Tried reinstalling, but there is no manual online even on their site. Throwing this hunk of junk out and going with a Kohler as I should've done in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: YoMomma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cabinet & a snap to hang
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is HUGE! Instructions a little confusing as it did not say to add one of the pieces to the wall cleat. Other than that, it was extremely easy to assemble and hang. Mirrored on front, sides, and inside of the door. I really like the cleat as it made it easy to install by myself. It is heavy and includes 2 adjustable shelves. Love the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cabinet especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful cabinet. Very well packaged. Arrived with only a small dent on the side but i can live with that. Mounting system works pretty well, but a bit uncomfortable with it being plastic. But it mounted fine and seems plenty secure. A bit difficult to adjust the doors to lign up. The small door is very stiff and hardvto open but hoping it will loosen up with time. All in all a very good buy and very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Jrs

customer_reviews.title: A great buy all around
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid, nicely-made, very attractive piece of bathroom equipment. Clean-looking, very good closure, and the entire inside is mirrored, which is a nice touch. The shelves are glass, the hinges are sturdy, the metal seems to be a good gauge -- nothing chintzy here. Excellent customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this unless you have two people to handle it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, well made medicine cabinet.It arrived with the inside mirror cracked in many places. It's very heavy, so I decided not to send it back. Moving and lifting it is a two person job. It's big and it's heavy. Beware. Make sure you open and inspect everything prior to keeping it. Learn from my mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Allen E. Shinder

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Heftier than most - good construction. Simple design with mirrored surfaces. We bought 2 - one for each bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: LNixon7

customer_reviews.title: Came with damaged hinge
customer_reviews.text: Came with damaged hinge, box was not damaged so looks like it was packed like this
customer_reviews.author: Nerijus Sakalauskas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but broken
customer_reviews.text: I would be giving this a 5 star review but two glass pieces were shattered when the package arrived. One small shelf and one side mirror. I don't want to have to go through the hassle of returning the entire cabinet but there is no method to replace those items. You have to return the entire cabinet with the potential of receiving another cabinet with broken pieces. I guess that's the chance you take when purchasing online that has so much glass. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Recessed mount beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful when installed as a recessed mount but does include the mirrors side panels for a surface mount. Instructions and included hardware were easy to use. The inside is mirrored also and the glass shelves are adjustable and beautiful. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and practical
customer_reviews.text: I love that there's mirrors on the side to make it look finished I didn't use the recessed option it's mounted on the wall I have professional mounted so I don't know how easy or hard that is but I love it and it's beautiful inside with mirrors also
customer_reviews.author: rare finds

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful medicine cabinet. Glass all around the outside AND on the inside. Excellent. The installation instructions were easy to follow. it was packed with a large amount of protection material given the fact it is glass and arrived without a single scratch or chip.
customer_reviews.author: AZSun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Love this cabinet. It's everything as described. Very heavy but our contractor handled it alone. The self closing hinges are a nice feature but somewhat stiff in the beginning. I would describe the cabinet as classy. It did arrive damaged in shipment (the carton had a gash) but that's a different story. You won't be disappointed if you purchase this cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: jat511

customer_reviews.title: excellent packaging protected it during shipment by a pack of ...
customer_reviews.text: This product took me twice as long to install as I expected. Yes, it took 5 minutes instead of 2-1/2! Seriously, excellent packaging protected it during shipment by a pack of orangutans that tore the box in multiple locations. Excellent design easily assembled & installed. My wife is ecstatic. Mirrors on the doors and back wall masker this a superb addition to our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cabinet, worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of tries, but finally received cabinet not damaged or missing parts. Very nice cabinet. It is nice that amazon offers such a good guarantee on returning items if there is a problem. We really are glad we got it. The doors shut quietly and the inside mirror is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy about taxes

customer_reviews.title: Installation “tricky”!
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the shelf “system” because glass shelving is hard to fit in some areas. Installation is “tricky”. Door hinges are large for the size of the fixture and maximized use of the storage area.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B. Hall

customer_reviews.title: They are so nice that the handyman called me to come look at ...
customer_reviews.text: You can not beat this mirrored triple wide bathroom vanity! Bought them to spruce up 2 bathrooms in a house we were selling. They are so nice that the handyman called me to come look at how beautiful they are. We just moved but I am trying to figure out if they will fit at our new house too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding mirrored medicine cabinet- Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This mirrored medicine cabinet is one of the best I've ever had and I've had many. This is extremely well built, looks great, has slow close doors and handles on the bottom so you don't have to touch the glass. Excellent all the way around. I highly recommend this cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Buedel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quality product that looks great and is carefully ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful,quality product that looks great and is carefully packaged to avoid damage. I would definitely advise taking off the doors before installing to make it easier to hang/unhang/rehang as the instructions have you do this many times. My only gripe is that the assembly instructions aren't as clear as they could be and the booklet that comes with the product is very generic and supposed to be usable for about 5 or 6 different style medicine cabinets. I blame Croydex for that and their website isn't very helpful either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and high end quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid, heavy-duty, soft-closing doors, interior mirrors, beautiful! I love the two doors so that you can easily view all sides of your head/hair. Buying 2 more for our master suite double sink addition.
customer_reviews.author: Solar Flare

customer_reviews.title: Great value mirror/medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This medicine cabinet measures up to much more expensive ones. This cabinet has lots of space and the many different angles of the mirrors are great. You can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: G J N

customer_reviews.title: This one is beautiful! Plenty of storage space for bathroom items
customer_reviews.text: Remodeled our master bathroom. I really wanted a medicine cabinet, in a not so typical style. This one is beautiful! Plenty of storage space for bathroom items. And enlarges the effect of the bathroom size with the beveled mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality item, quality packing and fast ship!
customer_reviews.text: A quality item! Packed EXTREMELY well and well-made. This medicine cabibet has mirrors inside and out and I especially like the soft close doors.
customer_reviews.author: Timhea

customer_reviews.title: Look good for shipping everything good and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Look good for shipping everything good and high quality,installed it's harder, I put at the wall in kitchen room, instead of restroom so far my wife like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sleek cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this cabinet for a replacement for an older,wooden one. It is very sleek and brightens our whole bathroom. Love the shelves. I would definitely recommend this item. Seems to be well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice appearance with beveled front mirror and mirrors on the side. Better value than comparable brands.
customer_reviews.author: peterbenner

customer_reviews.title: Great looking. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for over a year. Works great. No problems. Great size. Great quality. Looks great flush mounted or in the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Albores

customer_reviews.title: It's Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Mirrors inside and out. Slow close to prevent slamming. Glass shelves. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Surface mount was exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good quality medicine cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful medicine cabinet! BUT we thought it was 26" wide and 30" tall. It was the other way, SO we had to modify to be able to open window lever next to it. Other than that,this is great quality all around. Just remember it IS 30" wide and 26" tall.
customer_reviews.author: vino 666

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this cabinet. Well made, love the soft door closures and the mirrors inside also. Was very nervous about it being damaged in shipping but it was extremely well packed so no issue there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy cabinet, high end product For a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet is very heavy so requires at least two people to install. Love the trifold mirrors and the fact that all of the interior parts are high end. Glass shelving is movable, back wall is mirrored. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much better than Kohler's cabinets
customer_reviews.text: So much better than Kohler's cabinets. The brackets are hidden and the doors are soft close (hadn't noticed this before purchase).
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, great result.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow instructions, and great value. Good quality, looks and feels like our more expensive Kohler medicine cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Pminas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, and plenty of shelving
customer_reviews.text: Good quality,and plenty of shelving.easy close doors for smooth operation.
customer_reviews.author: russell s mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great looking modern medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our remodeled modern bathroom. Our contractor surfaced mounted it. Construction looks good. I really like the mirrors on the inside and the adjustable shelves. Only wish it was fog free.
customer_reviews.author: marizel bajao

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Beautiful cabinet. I installed inset, so it was super easy. Had I mounted it, probably would have been a pain.
customer_reviews.author: MZ Party of 6

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: 26X24 Nice looking mirror well done made easy to install it has mirror inside back panel inside doors and side panels outside too looks great good price very happy !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Romero

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and in one piece
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a few days which is a miracle for Hawaii. Beautiful and well made. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bulky hinges take up a lot of room in the cabinet and the cabinet is extremely heavy.
customer_reviews.author: sharon s calabrese

customer_reviews.title: On the Wall
customer_reviews.text: Very nice indeed. it's in my sons bathroom and it's more for a lot less.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: I you like mirrors in the bathroom you'll love this
customer_reviews.text: I you like mirrors in the bathroom you'll love this! I am very nearsighted so I need to be up close to a mirror. This beautiful cabinet is mirrored front, sides and even inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The picture shows it 26" wide by 30" tall, but it came 30" wide and 26" tall.  Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Misleading dimensions, wrong size screws for lower anchoring brackets, and door opening resistance it too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Marcdoyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in very secure packaging with no damage. It was easy to install and looks great! Like many other reviewers, I removed the doors during install, which made it much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mirror! The soft close doors are a very ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mirror! The soft close doors are a very nice feature. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used in the bathroom redo. Contract had no issues installing in the wall cavity. Plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: M N

customer_reviews.title: it looks great & works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Although my husband had somewhat of a difficult time hanging the unit (took 5+ hours), it looks great & works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for a Small Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Bought used from the warehouse for $53. Its the small 20 x 16 inch model. Highly recommend for small bathrooms. You will need help installing if you have no experience.
customer_reviews.author: Thuy Hong Pham

customer_reviews.title: I bought thin a few mounts ago and I just ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought thin a few mounts ago and I just install it 3 days ago and the door won’t fully close
customer_reviews.author: othmane

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Very easy to install. Delivered on time. Very good price. When I'm ready to redo the second bathroom, I will definitely be ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic cabinet. I was thrilled with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This medicine cabinet is wonderful, plenty of storage and built well
customer_reviews.text: This medicine cabinet is wonderful, plenty of storage and built well
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: What the mirror?
customer_reviews.text: Not even six months and the hinge breaks! Piece if garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. I think we are going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, instructions and easy to install. For the price, a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Georaff

customer_reviews.title: We received this item. It came with two shelves ...
customer_reviews.text: We received this item. It came with two shelves and they are the wrong size. They do not fit this cabinet
customer_reviews.author: LAJ9

customer_reviews.title: Broken.
customer_reviews.text: We were gathering items for a bathroom renovation so didn't open the cabinet when we received it. Opened it after the return window ended and found the mirror on the inside has a large crack. Useless to me now. Amazon obviously can't do anything as it is outside the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Malik

customer_reviews.title: I Am LIVID.  It is a beautiful cabinet,  but the product I received was NOT the same one as shown in the photos.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cabinet because the photo shows that it opens from the left hand side. I hired a handyman to hang it and then realized it only opens from the right-hand side, which means I cannot use it for my intended purpose. He followed the directions exactly and it was only able to be hung one way. It also did not come with the opening pin as shown in the photo. I’m 71 years old and not about to try and take this heavy cabinet off-the-wall, to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kajedo

customer_reviews.title: This is the online deal you're looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than Box store quality with a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Chatty

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: This unit with it's proprietary hang and lock system is not good. ..the unit is too tight to the wall at the top and then has a gap at the bottom The template instructions are not specific The bumpers are substandard and the door bangs on the cabinet. The plugs that fill up the holes in the cabinet itself are impossible to push in. I wish I had never bought these. Also they are made in China.. which is not indicated in the product review. I thought they were made in the UK... I try to stay away from anything made in China.. but it is hard to do. I
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find small cabinet
customer_reviews.text: We had a hard time finding a medicine cabinet for our second bath. this fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Ljw

product_meta.title: Croydex Halton 26-Inch x 30-Inch Bi-View Recessed or Surface Mount Medicine Cabinet with Hang 'N' Lock Fitting System, Aluminum
product_meta.description:
Size:26-Inch x 30-Inch - Double DoorThe elegant Halton cabinet has two mirrored doors open up to reveal abundant storage space to stash away all your bathroom essentials and five height adjustable shelves add to the organized look. The patented hang 'n' lock easy installation bracket from Croydex is a simple and safe solution to hang your cabinet or mirror. Hang 'n' lock provides the flexibility to change the level of your cabinet or mirror after having drilled your holes making it easy for a single person install.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The clean, elegant lines of this sophisticated cabinet would suit any style of bathroom and the many innovative and practical features ensure that the cabinet is functional as well as beautiful. The Hang 'N' Lock fixing system allows you to fix the supporting bracket to the wall rather than to the cabinet, so you do not have to struggle to measure distances and mark screw holes whilst supporting a heavy bathroom cabinet. This cabinet can also be surface mounted or recessed - depending on the cavity depth of your bathroom wall - so you can really optimize the space available in your bathroom.
feature_bullets: 165 Degree sprung hinges for increased accessibility
Easy to install Hang 'N' Lock system
